Overview over this manual
Chapter describes the installation of this package. Chapter describes the generic, recursive procedure used for group recognition throughout this package. At the heart of this procedure is the definition of FindHomomorphism methods, which is also described in that chapter. For the choice of the right method for finding a homomorphism (or an isomorphism) we use another generic procedure, the method selection which is not to be confused with the &GAP; method selection. Our own method selection is described in detail in Chapter , because it is interesting in its own right and might be useful in other circumstances.
